meanings.sent1: I enjoy the tanginess of the lemonade.
meanings.sent2: The salad dressing had a pleasant tanginess to it.
meanings.sent3: The tanginess of the salsa made my taste buds dance.
meanings.sent4: Her wit had a tanginess that left everyone laughing.
meanings.sent5: The tanginess of the pickles lingered on my tongue.

meanings.sent1: The cheese had a strong tanginess that I couldn't ignore.
meanings.sent2: The sauce had just the right amount of tanginess to it.
meanings.sent3: The tanginess of the chili made my eyes water.
meanings.sent4: His words had a tanginess that cut through the silence.
meanings.sent5: The tanginess of the spices woke up my taste buds.
